ValidationRule.description: The following fields are required in order to mark a Case record as Assessment: Settlement Amount, Installation Date, Settlement Business Rule
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Claim_Stage__c, "Assessment"), OR( ISBLANK( Total_Suggested_Settlement_Cost__c), ISBLANK( Installation_Date__c ) ), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure the Settlement Fields and Installation Date are not blank before moving the Stage to Assessment.
